segment.source: Windows Setup States
segment.target: Windows Setup States

segment.source: Windows Setup States
segment.target: Windows Setup States

segment.source: Windows Setup States
segment.target: Windows Setup States

segment.source: There are several states assigned to a Windows® image during installation.
segment.target: There are several states assigned to a Windows® image during installation.

segment.source: This state information can be used to detect automatically the different states and stages of Windows Setup.
segment.target: This state information can be used to detect automatically the different states and stages of Windows Setup.

segment.source: Windows Setup State Information
segment.target: Windows Setup State Information

segment.source: The Windows image state is stored in two locations, in the registry and in a file.
segment.target: The Windows image state is stored in two locations, in the registry and in a file.

segment.source: In the registry:
segment.target: In the registry:

segment.source: KEY: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftWindowsCurrentVersionSetupState
segment.target: KEY: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftWindowsCurrentVersionSetupState

segment.source: TYPE: REGSZ
segment.target: TYPE: REGSZ

segment.source: VALUE: StateName
segment.target: VALUE: StateName

segment.source: In a file:
segment.target: In a file:

segment.source: FILE: %WINDIR%SetupStateState.ini
segment.target: FILE: %WINDIR%SetupStateState.ini

segment.source: SECTION: State
segment.target: SECTION: State

segment.source: VALUE: StateName
segment.target: VALUE: StateName

segment.source: The following table describes the values that exist for StateName.
segment.target: The following table describes the values that exist for StateName.

segment.source: State name
segment.target: State name

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: IMAGE_STATE_COMPLETE
segment.target: IMAGE_STATE_COMPLETE

segment.source: The image has successfully been installed.
segment.target: The image has successfully been installed.

segment.source: The specialize and oobeSystem configuration passes are complete.
segment.target: The specialize and oobeSystem configuration passes are complete.

segment.source: This image is not deployable to a computer that has a different hardware configuration because it is now hardware-dependent.
segment.target: This image is not deployable to a computer that has a different hardware configuration because it is now hardware-dependent.

segment.source: To deploy this image to a computer that has a different hardware configuration, you must run sysprep /generalize.
segment.target: To deploy this image to a computer that has a different hardware configuration, you must run sysprep /generalize.

segment.source: IMAGE_STATE _UNDEPLOYABLE
segment.target: IMAGE_STATE _UNDEPLOYABLE

segment.source: This is the default state for an image in a given phase of Windows Setup that is not yet complete.
segment.target: This is the default state for an image in a given phase of Windows Setup that is not yet complete.

segment.source: If a process queries the IMAGE_STATE value and IMG_UNDEPLOYABLE is returned, the image is in one of the following states:
segment.target: If a process queries the IMAGE_STATE value and IMG_UNDEPLOYABLE is returned, the image is in one of the following states:

segment.source: Setup is currently running and has not fully completed the phase.
segment.target: Setup is currently running and has not fully completed the phase.

segment.source: Once a given phase is complete, the IMAGE_STATE will be set to an appropriate completion value.
segment.target: Once a given phase is complete, the IMAGE_STATE will be set to an appropriate completion value.

segment.source: If queried online when Setup is not running, there was a failure when completing a Setup phase.
segment.target: If queried online when Setup is not running, there was a failure when completing a Setup phase.

segment.source: This image must be reinstalled.
segment.target: This image must be reinstalled.

segment.source: If queried offline, the image did not finish a phase and will never be deployable.
segment.target: If queried offline, the image did not finish a phase and will never be deployable.

segment.source: IMAGE_STATE_GENERALIZE_RESEAL_TO_OOBE
segment.target: IMAGE_STATE_GENERALIZE_RESEAL_TO_OOBE

segment.source: The image has successfully completed the generalize configuration pass and will continue into OOBEsystem configuration pass when Setup is initiated.
segment.target: The image has successfully completed the generalize configuration pass and will continue into OOBEsystem configuration pass when Setup is initiated.

segment.source: IMAGE_STATE_GENERALIZE_RESEAL_TO_AUDIT
segment.target: IMAGE_STATE_GENERALIZE_RESEAL_TO_AUDIT

segment.source: The image has successfully completed the generalize configuration pass and will continue into audit mode when Setup is initiated.
segment.target: The image has successfully completed the generalize configuration pass and will continue into audit mode when Setup is initiated.

segment.source: IMAGE_STATE_SPECIALIZE_RESEAL_TO_OOBE
segment.target: IMAGE_STATE_SPECIALIZE_RESEAL_TO_OOBE

segment.source: The image has successfully completed the specialize pass and will continue into OOBEsystem configuration pass when Setup is initiated.
segment.target: The image has successfully completed the specialize pass and will continue into OOBEsystem configuration pass when Setup is initiated.

segment.source: IMAGE_STATE_SPECIALIZE_RESEAL_TO_AUDIT
segment.target: IMAGE_STATE_SPECIALIZE_RESEAL_TO_AUDIT

segment.source: The image has successfully completed the specialize configuration pass and will continue into audit mode when Setup is initiated.
segment.target: The image has successfully completed the specialize configuration pass and will continue into audit mode when Setup is initiated.

segment.source: The following examples show how to access state information.
segment.target: The following examples show how to access state information.

segment.target: To access state information from the registry:

segment.target: To access state information from a file:
